name: Hellfire Engine
resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren\'t silvered
condition_immunities: charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, poisoned, unconscious

traits.Immutable Form: The hellfire engine is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.
traits.Magic Resistance: The hellfire engine has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
